attributes.action:
Hi UK Government,

Let’s put a cap on how much childcare facilities can charge
attributes.additional_details: To create a better future for families
attributes.background: Child Care is so expensive. UK comes in at No.2 for the country that has the most expensive child care in the world. Single mother’s might not be able to afford child care so they might then not get a job because most of their salary goes to child care

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how much to charge for childcare are a matter for individual providers, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We can accept petitions calling for changes to Government support for free childcare, if you'd like to see changes to these entitlement.

If you wanted to submit a new petition you would need to provide your full name.
